name: Japanese Tofu Salad
author: JOSIE
summary: Here is a simple way of incorporating tofu into your diet.  You can certainly play around with this recipe, adding whatever you like, I garnish mine with lime wedges.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons sesame oil, or to taste
directions: Place tofu between two plates, and weigh down with a heavy book
Allow tofu to drain for 1 hour, pouring out the expelled liquid every 20 minutes
Whisk together the soy sauce, mirin, sesame oil, and rice vinegar in a small bowl
Heat the oil in a small pan over medium heat, stir in the garlic and ginger, and gently cook until lightly golden; stir into the soy sauce mixture
Cut tofu into bite-sized pieces, and toss together with the tomato, onion, and cilantro
Pour in the dressing and toss to coat
Garnish with a sprinkle of sesame seeds
